main event: A civilian pilot observed a blue and white object flashing and moving up and down in the sky near New Orleans.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 to 5 minutes., The object was observed moving in a northeastern direction., The pilot concluded it was definitely a star., The report includes a note stating it was definitely not an aircraft or balloon., The conclusion of the report categorized the sighting as astronomical.
sighted object: one blue and white flashing object
